#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define gc getchar_unlocked

inline int in() {
	char c=gc();
	while(c<'0' || c>'9')
		c=gc();
	int num=0;
	while(c>='0' && c<='9') {
		num=10*num+c-48;
		c=gc();
	}
	return num;
}

main() {
	int T,N,u,i,j,k,x,y,M,p;
	int a[10005]={0};
	T=in();
	while(T--) {
		N=in(); u=in();
		for(x=0;x<u;x++) {
			i=in(); j=in(); k=in();
			for(y=i;y<=j;y++)
				a[y]+=k;
		}
		M=in();
		while(M--) {
			p=in();
			printf("%d\n",a[p]);
		}
		for(i=0;i<N;i++) a[i]=0;
	}
}
